plot: Profiles the Burger family as they sit around their kitchen table and sort through the post-cards sent by Eric Burger, husband and father, during his deployments in Iraq and Afghanistan.
title: To the Burgers
plot_es: Profiles the Burger family as they sit around their kitchen table and sort through the post-cards sent by Eric Burger, husband and father, during his deployments in Iraq and Afghanistan.
plot_en: Profiles the Burger family as they sit around their kitchen table and sort through the post-cards sent by Eric Burger, husband and father, during his deployments in Iraq and Afghanistan.
